titleStmt.title: The demands, resolutions, and intentions of the Army; vnder the command of Generall Fairfax, and Major Generall Cromwell: for the speedy settlement of the state in peace, according to truth, without treating with those whom wee have already conquered. Commanded to be printed and communicated to all the free-borne people of England, Tuesd. September 26. 1648.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Army. Council.
England and Wales. Army. aut

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
